en.title: FE at Dubai Direct Selling Festival 03rd - 04th April 2009!
en.content:
REPORT FROM FE PRESIDENTIAL DIRECTOR PASTOR ARTHUR MEDINA.

I am very happy to report to you the highlights of Dubai Direct Selling Festival on 03rd & 04th April 2009.

FusionExcel International joined the 2nd Dubai Direct Selling Festival on 03rd & 04th April 2009 in support of building power networks in the Gulf Cooperation Council (GCC) states - Bahrain, Kuwait, Oman, Qatar, the United Arab Emirates, and Saudi Arabia headed by our GCC Licensee Mr Ali Khalid.

The exhibit brought network marketing professionals as well as entrepreneurs in the region looking for new opportunities that DSA Festival could offer. Our FE leaders composed of Presidential Director Pastor Art Medina, Presidential Director Pastor Dave Trinidad, India Stockiest Director Dr Jacob K.B. and GCC Country Licensee Mr. Ali Khalid had shown the participants that FE's Business System is Simple, Easy, and an Exciting global opportunity that they can do to overcome the negative effects of the current global economic downturn.

We have new FE leaders from Philippines like Rommel Andrade and Glenda who works with Golf Courses in Dubai, Binu and George from India, and several serious network marketers from Tehran, Saudi, Ukraine, Russia, Pakistan, Australia, and literally hundreds of Indians. We thank our Dubai Stockiest, Niel Colinares for facilitating our visa application and hotel accommodation (excellent leadership!). We are opening up our office in Dubai as soon as possible to serve our growing network marketers in this global city in GCC. Indeed, FE builds power networks worldwide!!!

Ahoo! Ahoo!! Ahoo!!

Ahoo! Ahoo! Ahoo!
